en.description: A Battle Avionics that deploys an electro-magnetic pulse that deals damage to enemies and disables them temporarily. manual detonation increases the blast radius. drops from gyre taktis (saturn.)

ru.description: A Battle Avionics that deploys an electro-magnetic pulse that deals damage to enemies and disables them temporarily. manual detonation increases the blast radius. drops from gyre taktis (saturn.)
